# Image Gallery


import os
from pathlib import Path

def display_images(folder_path):
    image_files = list(Path(folder_path).glob("*.jpg"))
    html_code = ""
    for image_file in image_files:
        html_code += f"![{image_file.name}]({image_file})\n\n"
    return html_code

# Define your folders
folders = ["content/bv172tc9618", "content/images/folder2", "content/images/folder3"]

# Generate HTML for each folder
gallery_html = ""
for folder in folders:
    gallery_html += f"## {Path(folder).name}\n\n"
    gallery_html += display_images(folder)

print(gallery_html)
